# cv

RMarkdown code for building CV and resumes from education, experience, and
awards stored as CSV files and publications stored as BibTeX file. Code depends
on vitae package. Repository and cv/resume design template is borrowed from [@natbprice](github.com/natbprice/cv), which is a combination of vitae::hyndman and
a template by Steven Miller (http://svmiller.com/blog/2016/03/svm-r-markdown-cv/).
